name: places/ChIJZz6_-gBZwokR4N7Iu47TYGc
formattedAddress: 39 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 39 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

editorialSummary.text: Veteran shop offering ready-made frames as well as custom framing for art, posters & memorabilia.

originalText.text: Fantastic work done here! Was told my two frames would be ready in a week (I told him I wasn’t in a rush and one week was fine when he asked when I needed it by) and it was actually ready in 3 days! Very nice gentleman who works here. Very personable!

text.text: Fantastic work done here! Was told my two frames would be ready in a week (I told him I wasn’t in a rush and one week was fine when he asked when I needed it by) and it was actually ready in 3 days! Very nice gentleman who works here. Very personable!

originalText.text: Would not recommend. I needed a framing job done within a few days time, so of course opted for the framing shop with “One Hour” framing in its name. I dropped off the painting on Thursday for a Monday pickup. I called Monday morning to inquire when it would be ready and the person on the other line had “no idea.” They called back a few hours later only to blurt something out and hang up when I answered. I called them back an hour or so later, after my work meeting, when the framer finally told me that he had supposedly broken the original wood frame and could only get a metal frame done within the original timeframe he promised. The metal frame options were limited so in order to make the deadline, I opted for an ugly black metal frame that clashes…far from the beautiful wood frame I originally picked out. Not once did they apologize or offer me a discount on my service. Their only alternative was me bringing back in the painting for a different frame on another day—which would require me taxi’ing myself and the frame another round trip. Overall, super disappointed with the lack of service for a “custom” experience. Never going back.

originalText.text: Waseem is an absolute framing expert! I came in with 3 separate items for my nephew's graduation & his patience at understanding what I wanted was nothing less than perfection. Waseem patiently listened & gave me great suggestions. Not even one week later I had the fabulous frame & better still, my nephew was ecstatic on receiving it. I can't give this man enough praise, he truly knows what he is doing. And for those just wandering in the area, pop in & have a look, he has some great unique items. I shall def be going back for more!

originalText.text:
This shop does exceptional work—pristine, precise, beautiful. I needed a piece framed very quickly for a very important client who wanted it for a meeting the next day. The frame shop I usually use said they needed approximately four days to frame this 8 x 11 piece. I just wanted a white mat and a basic black frame.
After reading the reviews on Google, I called and spoke to one of the owners, who could not have been nicer or more helpful. I brought my piece in the next morning when they opened and met this nice gentleman who had been so helpful. He asked me if I could pick it up the next day and when I told him that I needed it for a meeting early in the next morning and was in a rush, he said he could definitely do it by that afternoon. He said he would call me to pick it up when it was ready. He called me one and a half hours later and said that the framed piece was ready to be picked up.
I was cautiously optimistic because I was just taking the word of reviewers, so did not know what to expect. When he opened the wrapping around the piece , I was absolutely delighted and amazed at how beautifully the piece turned out. The client as well as the recipient were over the moon.
I will definitely use this business again. Many times, of that I am certain.

originalText.text: The One Hour Framing Shop staff is top notch and the very best in NYC!  From start to finish they work with you to understand what you need and when you need it and they all do a fabulous job!  I can’t say enough about how wonderful the entire staff is and the beautiful work that they do. If you need expert craftsmanship, on time, reliable with the best quality materials…this is the place to trust your framing needs with. They have earned our business and I am sure will earn yours.  We highly recommend them.  Thanks to the entire staff for making our framed medal so quickly and so professionally done with care.
